EditTextPreference.android:title: Alpha for low pass filter
EditTextPreference.android:summary: A lower alpha will try to 'smooth' the values more

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use the gyroscope to rotate the model
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If checked, it will use the gyroscope to rotate the model, otherwise it will use the rotation matrix from the accelerometer and compass

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: User Control
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If checked, the user will be able to control the 3d model
